price: 21. En wie is er onrechtvaardiger dan degenen die leugens over Allah verzint of Zijn tekenen verwerpt? Waarlijk, de onrechtvaardigen zullen nooit slagen.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biāyātihi innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-ẓālimūna
